name: OpenCars (AceSoft)
description:
OpenCars

OpenCars is a prototype of a game that will soon be a 2D Car Driving game, expect more stuff to be added!

AceSoft2021 (C)

Controls for 1.1

WASD/Arrow Keys (PC Platform)

Dedicated Buttons (Mobile Platform)

Controls for 1.0:

The Left arrow (←) Steers the car to the left.

The Right arrow (→) Steers the car to the right.

The Pedal Accelerates the Car.

The Sport And Drive Toggle are speeds,

the Drive can go up to 3, While The Sport

can go up to 4. You can only drive/switch to

Sport when you are at a speed of 2 or greater.

AceSoft2021 (C)

ChangeLog:

1.0

-New game

1.1

-New brand reworked rendering engine

-Bigger Map

-More Cars

-Menu

-Removed Sport and Drive

-Added PC Support

-Added Shop

-Added Coins

-Added Minimap
